pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:0.5_0: The training rules on getting trainee nuns ... novice nuns ... female householders to massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.11_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.12_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun gets (a trainee nun ... a novice nun ...) a female householder to massage her or to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.1_0: ... female householders to massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.2_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.3_0: “How can the nuns have female householders massage and rub them? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.4_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.6_0: “How can nuns have female householders massage and rub them?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.10_0: a female who lives in a house is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.12_0: if she gets someone else to massage, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.14_0: if she gets someone else to carry it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.6_0: one training for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.1.8_0: a male training in the ten training rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.2.3_0: They burn in times of trouble,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91-93:2.2.6_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
